attributes.action: No more building on 'Greenfield' land, no more development in the countryside
attributes.additional_details: A multitude of recent Governments have ignored pleas from rural campaigners not to build and allow development on green space in the UK. Britain is already one of the most urbanised countries in the world and countryside is being ruined in this country at an alarming rate. It is time to say no to further development in the beautiful British countryside.
